About the Role

The Company, a leading financial institution, is seeking a VP- Marketing Business Partnership with a focus on the Elite Target Segment. The role involves creating and executing consumer-focused marketing plans across a portfolio of products, managing agency relationships, and leading a team of creative marketers. The successful candidate will be responsible for inspiring the team to work collaboratively across various functions, including creative, digital, social, operations, research, analytics, activation, and PR. The VP will also be expected to translate the vision for the products into marketing and communication plans, with a strong emphasis on consumer insight-driven campaigns, and to deliver on executional excellence, managing projects on time and within budget.

Applicants should have a strong background in marketing, with experience in marketing management, digital marketing, advertising, agency management, project management, and leadership. The role requires a strategic approach to increase the company's position in the market, with a customer-first focus, NPS improvement, and digitization. Key performance indicators for the role include lead generation, revenue growth, market share growth, brand health scores growth, team development, creative content scores, annual marketing plans, and marketing mix management. The company offers a dynamic and business-oriented environment, with an open, informal, and personal marketing culture that values learning, entrepreneurship, and teamwork.
